Simon remains stiff with shock and discomfort. MS. ALBRIGHT (CONT’D) I’m sorry you guys had to see that. Today's rehearsal is cancelled. Everyone slowly gets up and heads out. Cal gives Simon a smile as he passes. But it’s impossible to tell if he’s B or if he’s just being supportive. After a moment, Simon turns to Taylor:

dialogues.speaker: SIMON
dialogues.text: Um, thanks. And I’m sorry. About missing a rehearsal. I know how much this means to you. Taylor stares at him, surprised.

dialogues.speaker: TAYLOR
dialogues.text: It's just a play, Simon. (then) Fuck those guys. He nods, surprised by this other side of Taylor. As Abby passes Simon, she gives him a stoic:  100.

dialogues.text: I’m sorry. That was messed up. But doesn't stop walking. Ms. Albright approaches Simon.

dialogues.speaker: MS. ALBRIGHT
dialogues.text: Are you okay?

dialogues.text: (mortified) Yes. I’m sorry.
